headline: Live Nation price target raised to $166 from $145 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen analyst Doug Creutz raised the firm’s price target on Live Nation (LYV) to $166 from $145 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm updated its model following Q4 results and management’s 2025 outlook. TD Cowen continues to also see a higher likelihood of a favorable regulatory outcome in a Trump administration.
